main event: A round object, the size of a basketball, was observed at a 45-degree angle moving at constant speed toward the horizon for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes, The object was moving at an unusual speed that led the witness to believe it was a balloon, The report's observations were conducted under clear weather conditions, An aircraft (DC-6) was seen at low altitude in the vicinity during the observation, The object suddenly disappeared from view.
witness description: Witness suspected it was probably a balloon.
